name: .ANYDESK File Extension
summary: Learn about .ANYDESK files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can play an ANYDESK file in AnyDesk's Session Player. To do so, either double-click the file on a device that has AnyDesk installed, or select the file from the Session History icon that appears in AnyDesk's top-right corner.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
